title: Watch: Food rules to follow before and after COVID19 vaccination - Times of India
author: TIMESOFINDIA COM; May 3

cleaned_text: Amidst the pandemic, the [COVID19 vaccination](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/covid19-vaccination) drive looks like a ray of hope that will change the face of the country in the coming months. But, do you know that even during the vaccination process, it is important to take care of your immune system? Yes, you read it right and to make it easier, recently, celebrity nutritionist Pooja Makhija shared a quick video that talks about the dos and don'ts to follow before and after [COVID](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/coronavirus) vaccination. She took to her official Instagram and shared a video post and wrote, "To improve the efficacy of the Covid vaccine, follow these basics but must do essentials." Have a look at her video: According to her video post, these are the three things that you need to do before and after COVID vaccinationProper hydration: It is important to stay hydrated pre and post-vaccination, as dehydration may lead to soreness at the sight of vaccination. Pooja recommends that one should take ample amounts of fluids like water, high-water fruits, soup, and vegetable juices.No alcohol before and after: It is recommended that you must avoid alcohol a day before and a day after the vaccination. It suppresses your immune system and also dehydrates you quickly. So, avoid it at all costs.Sound sleep: Make sure that you take ample rest and a good night sleep before vaccination. It has been proven that inadequate sleep can suppress your immunity by 70 percent. So, make sure that you get a sound sleep a day before vaccination. Apart from these, Pooja also recommends eating healthy, home-cooked comfort food and avoid all sorts of junk food in present time to avoid any infection that can further weaken your immune system.
